description: This file defines a Python class 'LlamaOpenAI' that interacts with the Llama API using an OpenAI-like interface. It includes methods for formatting messages and creating an asynchronous HTTP client, and imports various modules and dependencies.

classes.name: LlamaOpenAI
classes.description: A class for interacting with the Llama API via an OpenAI-like interface, extending OpenAILike.

methods.name: _format_message
methods.description: Formats a message into the format expected by the Llama API using the imported 'format_message' utility.

methods.name: get_async_client
methods.description: Creates and returns a customized asynchronous HTTP client that handles redirects properly for the Llama API.
